attributes.action: Provide help to people filling in job application forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i, like many other people around britain find it really difficult filling in job application forms and have not been able to find a job because my application form never gets past the first stage, like so many other people around britain who want a change of job or just simply a job it all come down to application forms i wish the prime minister to set up some sort of free advice line to help people write there job application forms

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
